p: Pyrrosia lingua (Thunb.) Farw. ( Polypodiaceae) is a perennial plant that grows in China, India, Japan and other territories of the Asia-Pacific region, and in Russia, it is found in the Far East. Plants of this type contain chlorogenic acid, flavonoids and xanthones. It is known (in vitro study) that flavonoids contribute to antioxidant capacity more than vitamin C and other antioxidants [ 37, 38, 39].
